about_the_game:
Paragrowth is Survival RPG game, placed in giant and dark forest.

Scavenge and explore areas mysteriously overgrown by trees and living roots.
Discover history about the place and find useful equipment to help you survive.

Travel further and meet few of other survivors, which can help you understand what's going on.
Your target might not be just survive, but something more.



Find hideout to survive nights full of paranormal activities and to hide from deadly monsters.
Prepare building and survive until soon rise up.


Hunt mutating prey for ingredients to make yourself mutate with forest but in controllable way and inject enemies abilities into yourself.

game Flow:

When area you're in is completely explored, you can prepare for big travel through underground tunnels to enter new unique area (no way back) of the same map size, find new shelter, beware of murderous creatures and find new resources to survive.



Maps will be generated procedurally, as well as most of the buildings and small areas placed on map, to make each area exploration unique.
Free to switch for interaction FPS camera to handle indoor physical elements.
Game is full of custom procedural animations giving more organic feel for characters and enemies.
Game also features the custom expansive sound system for precise audio modulation inside buildings as well as audio waves behavior in the forest (far animals/creatures sounds)

Game Is Currently In Early Stage Of Development.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains scary horror monsters and corpses

detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game



Paragrowth is Survival RPG game, placed in giant and dark forest.

Scavenge and explore areas mysteriously overgrown by trees and living roots.
Discover history about the place and find useful equipment to help you survive.

Travel further and meet few of other survivors, which can help you understand what's going on.
Your target might not be just survive, but something more.



Find hideout to survive nights full of paranormal activities and to hide from deadly monsters.
Prepare building and survive until soon rise up.


Hunt mutating prey for ingredients to make yourself mutate with forest but in controllable way and inject enemies abilities into yourself.

game Flow:

When area you're in is completely explored, you can prepare for big travel through underground tunnels to enter new unique area (no way back) of the same map size, find new shelter, beware of murderous creatures and find new resources to survive.



Maps will be generated procedurally, as well as most of the buildings and small areas placed on map, to make each area exploration unique.
Free to switch for interaction FPS camera to handle indoor physical elements.
Game is full of custom procedural animations giving more organic feel for characters and enemies.
Game also features the custom expansive sound system for precise audio modulation inside buildings as well as audio waves behavior in the forest (far animals/creatures sounds)

Game Is Currently In Early Stage Of Development.
name: Paragrowth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: i5 3GHz or Ryzen 5 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Paragrowth is Survival RPG game placed in giant dark forest. Scavenge and explore countryside areas overgrown by trees and mysterious living roots. Find hideout to survive nights full of paranormal activities. Hunt mutating prey for ingredients to inject enemies abilities into yourself.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German
*languages with full audio support
